Uses of Task in de.fhb.sailboat.mission
 

Classes in de.fhb.sailboat.mission that implement Task
 class BeatTask
          Task for a beating behavior.
 class CompassCourseTask
          Task for driving a course only based on the compass.
 class CrossLineTask
          Task for crossing a line, defined by two GPS points.
 class HoldAngleToWindTask
          Task for driving a course only based on the wind.
 class PrimitiveCommandTask
          Task for setting values for the actuators directly.
 class ReachCircleTask
          Task for driving towards a circle, consisting of a GPS point as center and a radius.
 class ReachPolygonTask
          Task for driving towards a polygon, consisting of GPS points.
 class RepeatTask
          Task for repeated execution of other tasks.
 class StopTask
          Task that causes the boat to stop.

Constructors in de.fhb.sailboat.mission with parameters of type Task
BeatTask(Task continueTask, GPS goal)
          Creates a new instance with the GPS point to be reached and the Task, that was executed before and is to be continued after the beating.
 

Constructor parameters in de.fhb.sailboat.mission with type arguments of type Task

          Creates a new instance with the given tasks, which are repeated n times, where repetitions specifies n.
